name: Lighting Decision Jam
description:
“Lighting Decision Jam” is a problem solving and decision workshop that will allow you to:


  • Define problems and reframe them as opportunities
  • Come up with valuable solution ideas 
  • And develop an strategic action plan for your work


You can use it to help you work though pretty much any type of challenge and it will only take under one hour of your time. 



For more information abut this dynamic check the following video by AJ&Smart: https://youtu.be/33hBnZzoFAg
